name: Steel Eel
description:
This was made over the course of a 30 hour period in an impromptu jam between my friend Wyatt Joyner and I. Please enjoy! (Note that you have to die once before the game works. No idea why qq.)

Objective:

Find the door switch to unlock the door and escape without getting caught!

Controls:

Point cursor to move in a direction.

Squiggle cursor to increase speed.

Click on a door switch to open a door.

If captured, click on the enemy to zap them and escape.
